contentLists.heading: How Fintech Solutions at Techtic are different from the others?
contentLists.content:
Fintech Solutions at Techtic are different from the others because:

  • Highly experienced Fintech app developers
  • 24*7 Robust supports team
  • Deliver project on time and in budget
  • Agile Development Process
  • Transparent communication and development process
  • Good testimonials and client reviews
  • Excellent coding standards
  • Customer-centric Approach
  • Result-oriented strategies

contentLists.heading: How do I communicate and give instructions to my Hired Fintech Developers?
contentLists.content: If you hire dedicated developers then you can directly communicate with the Fintech developers and give instructions. Otherwise, we assigned project manager for your Fintech project. You need to communicated with assigned project manager and give them instructions.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop my Fintech App or Software?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your Fintech App or Software projects and factors like features, and functionalities you want to have in your Fintech application. To precisely understand in-detail please, you can email us your Fintech application requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch with us today.

contentLists.heading: What are the services or features I received in your Fintech Development Solutions?
contentLists.content:
Based on our research, a good Fintech App has below listed features:

  • Simple and Easy to Use Fintech App
  • Protection of Sensitive Data
  • Security of App
  • Payment Integration
  • Machine Learning
  • Voice Integration
  • Blockchain
  • API Integration
  • 24*7 Support

contentLists.heading: What are the pricing models for Fintech App Development?
contentLists.content: We offer a fixed time/price model and a fixed dedicated resource model for your Fintech App Development. You can choose hiring model as per your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: How do I choose the best Fintech development company or Fintech Developers?
contentLists.content:
For finding the best Fintech app development company, you should check below listed points:

  • Check Company’s Development Process
  • Check Company’s Fintech Portfolio
  • Ask them about Product Security
  • Ask then about Post Development Testing, Support, and Maintenance
  • Check Company’s Hiring Model
  • Client reviews and recommendations
  • Online presence and digital footprints
  • Transparency in operation and collaboration

contentLists.heading: How to develop fintech apps?
contentLists.content:
For developing a Fintech App, Techtic follow below listed steps:

  • Research for Niche Market
  • Starting to build MVP Model
  • Prepare an Effective Development Approach
  • Select best Managed Cloud Services
  • Choose Right Technology Stack for App
  • Develop the App (UI/UX Design & App Development)
  • Testing, Marketing & Deployment

contentLists.heading: How good are you with Fintech Solutions?
contentLists.content: Techtic has worked with some of the most amazing companies for creating absolutely scalable and stunning Fintech solutions. Yes, we have good experience working with Fintech software development services, including invoicing solutions, payment solutions, data analytics, and business intelligence solutions.

contentLists.heading: How much do you charge to build fintech solution?
contentLists.content: Every digital product that we start working with have different kind of requirements and we believe in building secure, scalable and robust custom solutions for our customers. We offer FREE product discovery sesion, where we will be happy to review your product requirement and give you some insightful solutions and insights.

contentLists.heading: Do you guys work with equity?
contentLists.content: The simplest answer is No. Not because we don’t believe in the idea, but we get pitched the ideas on daily basis and having us to be invested into multiple ventures, practically becomes impossible for us since, our vision doesn’t align.
